articles.author: Elena Giordano
articles.title: Finland urges NATO, EU to shield critical networks after undersea cables damaged - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Defense minister tells POLITICO that “Russia has [the] capability and willingness to do sabotage in Europe.”
articles.content: This marks the second time in a year that Baltic Sea infrastructure which includes communications cables and energy pipelines such as Nord Stream has been damaged, raising concerns over security and … [+954 chars]
